articles.title: German Economy Stalled in Second Quarter, Weighed Down by Trade - Bloomberg

articles.content:
Business confidence in Germany took another hit in August, despite the economy just exiting a recession in the second quarter.

articles.content: Get your buns ready! We are looking for Cincinnati's Favorite Burger. And much like The Enquirer's annual Cincinnati's Favorite Beer championship held in March, your votes alone will pick the winner.… [+1597 chars]
